name: part_006
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】あくあ色ふぇすてぃばる。【#湊あくあ4周年記念】 [O4Ip7gZQOts]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'How-to World Domination'.
MC section where Aqua and Kanata discuss their performance and anniversary.

subtitles.original: ハウトゥー世界征服 作曲・作詞：Neru
subtitles.english: How-to World Domination | Music & Lyrics: Neru

subtitles.original: 泣きべそばかりかいてるのはどっちの面
subtitles.english: Which one of us is it making a tearful face?

subtitles.original: 笑われた分だけやり返せ
subtitles.english: Give back as much as you were laughed at

subtitles.original: 今に見てろと手に取った物は
subtitles.english: What I picked up, saying "Just you wait"

subtitles.original: 爆弾やナイフなんてもんじゃないけど
subtitles.english: Wasn't anything like a bomb or a knife, but...

subtitles.original: 一切合切今後どうなったって約束しよう
subtitles.english: Let's promise, no matter what happens from here on out

subtitles.original: 背中の値札を引き剥がせ
subtitles.english: Tear off the price tag on your back

subtitles.original: 廃材みたいな毎日だけど
subtitles.english: Every day is like scrap metal, but...

subtitles.original: 捨てるのはまだ早いだろ
subtitles.english: It's too early to throw it all away, isn't it?

subtitles.original: 今日も 打ち震えながら
subtitles.english: Today as well, while trembling

subtitles.original: 終着駅のホームで
subtitles.english: On the platform of the terminal station

subtitles.original: 明日の僕がまだ待っている
subtitles.english: Tomorrow's me is still waiting

subtitles.original: わがままで どん欲な 主の御許へ
subtitles.english: To the presence of the selfish and greedy master

subtitles.original: どうせいっそ願って狂う間がその全てなら
subtitles.english: If that's all there is for as long as I'm wishing and going crazy anyway

subtitles.original: きっと真似した機械が喋れるぞ
subtitles.english: I'm sure a machine that mimics can talk

subtitles.original: 何だって言いたいんだ、眼に見える前に
subtitles.english: I want to say something, before it becomes visible to the eye

subtitles.original: 心の傷をちょっと癒してくれ
subtitles.english: Heal the wounds in my heart a little

subtitles.original: あんな空でミサイルが飛ぶのなら
subtitles.english: If missiles are flying in that sky

subtitles.original: そんなもので幸せを乞うのなら
subtitles.english: If you're begging for happiness with things like that

subtitles.original: 優しい人にならなくちゃ
subtitles.english: I have to become a kind person

subtitles.original: 僕は僕を肯定してけるかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if I'll be able to accept myself

subtitles.original: ということで！
subtitles.english: And so!

subtitles.original: かなたん来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Kanatan, thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: お邪魔します！
subtitles.english: Thank you for having me!

subtitles.original: いやー、あくたん、
subtitles.english: Man, Akutan,

subtitles.original: 4周年おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations on your 4th anniversary!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: かなたんにお祝いしてもらったの、なんかちょっと嬉しい、ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: I'm actually quite happy to have Kanatan celebrate with me, thank you

subtitles.original: 何々？
subtitles.english: What what?

subtitles.original: いや、あの、前も僕の誕生日の時に一緒に…
subtitles.english: No, well, we were together on my birthday too...

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます、そちらもおめでとうございました
subtitles.english: Thank you, and congratulations to you as well for that

subtitles.original: あの時はですね、MCがなかったんで、
subtitles.english: At that time, we didn't have an MC section,

subtitles.original: そうっすね。
subtitles.english: That's true.

subtitles.original: なにげにあの、こうやって喋るのは…
subtitles.english: Implicitly, talking like this...

subtitles.original: 2人きりでは、あの、なんと初めましてということで。
subtitles.english: Between just the two of us, well, it's actually the first time.

subtitles.original: 初めまして！
subtitles.english: Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: ども、ども。
subtitles.english: Hello, hello.

subtitles.original: いやー、僕たち、あの…
subtitles.english: Man, we, well...

subtitles.original: 今回なんで呼んでくれたのかなっていう。
subtitles.english: I wonder why you invited me this time.

subtitles.original: え、なんかでもね、やっぱあの、かなたんと…
subtitles.english: Well, somehow, you know, with Kanatan...

subtitles.original: この曲歌いたいなって思ってたんだよね。
subtitles.english: I've been wanting to sing this song.

subtitles.original: おー、嬉しい！
subtitles.english: Oh, I'm glad!

subtitles.original: あの、僕たちあの、あまりコラボとかもしてなくてさ。
subtitles.english: Well, we haven't really done many collabs.

subtitles.original: そうだね、そうだね、あんまりしてない、本当にしてないね！
subtitles.english: That's true, that's true, we haven't done many, really haven't!

subtitles.original: 本当にいつしたんだ最後は？
subtitles.english: Really, when was the last time we did?

subtitles.original: 歌、一緒に歌ってるから、ちょいちょいね。
subtitles.english: Since we sing together, we do see each other from time to time.

subtitles.original: あー、歌ってみたとかね。
subtitles.english: Ah, like in "Utattemita" (cover) videos.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Right, right, right.

subtitles.original: いっぱい歌ったしね。
subtitles.english: We've sung together a lot.

subtitles.original: そうそうそう。
subtitles.english: Right, right, right.

subtitles.original: でも、ほら、最近LINE交換…
subtitles.english: But look, we recently exchanged LINE...
